audioText: Vous irez au marché acheter des légumes frais pour le dîner.
question: What does the speaker say you will do at the market?
options: To buy fresh vegetables for dinner.
To buy fresh fruits for breakfast.
To buy fresh meat for lunch.
To buy fresh bread for dinner.
explanation: The text states 'Vous irez au marché acheter des légumes frais pour le dîner.' - You will go to the market to buy fresh vegetables for dinner. The distractors test misinterpretation of the items or meal (fruits for breakfast, meat for lunch, bread for dinner).
